meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, L1FN Auditorium and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Call to Order
agenda_items.description: Opening of the meeting by the President.

agenda_items.title: Roll Call
agenda_items.description: Attendance check conducted by the Housing Project Manager.

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes for the June 11, 2024 meeting.

agenda_items.title: Public Hearing on The Mondello
agenda_items.description: Public hearing regarding the issuance of bonds for The Mondello multifamily development.

agenda_items.title: Public Hearing on West Virginia Apartments
agenda_items.description: Public hearing regarding the issuance of bonds for West Virginia Apartments.

agenda_items.title: Action Item: Resolutions for Axis Kessler Park
agenda_items.description: Consider and adopt partnership resolutions for Axis Kessler Park.

agenda_items.title: Action Item: Resolution for 555 Ross
agenda_items.description: Consider and adopt a resolution for the acquisition of 555 Ross.

agenda_items.title: Review of Treasurer’s Report
agenda_items.description: Review and discussion of the DHFC Treasurer’s report.

agenda_items.title: Review of Pipeline Report
agenda_items.description: Review and discussion of the Corporation’s pipeline report.

agenda_items.title: Adjourn
agenda_items.description: Closing of the meeting by the President.
